dmca.title: Copyright Infringement issue
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Keith Halliday [mailto:keith@ggs.co.uk] 
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 2004 7:09 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: chris@ggs.co.uk; web@ggs.co.uk; Sales WSD
Subject: Copyright Infringement issue

 

Attention: Mr Lance Crosby - Chief Operating Officer

Re: Copyright Infringement issue

It has been brought to our attention that a website we believe you currently
host is in breach of copyrighted material. 
The website in question is http://www.focusdesigns.co.uk.

The Splash page at http://www.focusdesigns.co.uk has imagery stolen from us,
namely the four graphic devices at the head of that page.

The Home page at http://www.focusdesigns.co.uk/index1.htm is a replication
of a page from our own website - 
see http://www.ggs.co.uk/section_intros/websites/websites.html.

The FAQ's page at http://www.focusdesigns.co.uk/faq.htm is a replication of
a page from our own website - 
see http://www.ggs.co.uk/frames/websites/faqs/framer.htm.

The Design & Build page at http://www.focusdesigns.co.uk/design_build.htm is
a replication of a page from our own website - 
see http://www.ggs.co.uk/frames/websites/design_build/framer.htm.

The On-Line Publication page at http://www.focusdesigns.co.uk/ONLINE.htm is
a replication of a page from our own website - 
see http://www.ggs.co.uk/frames/websites/online_publication/framer.htm.

The Portfolio Selection page at http://www.focusdesigns.co.uk/portfilio.htm
is based on a page from our own website - 
see http://www.ggs.co.uk/frames/websites/portfolio_selection/framer.htm -
although the content has changed in part.

The Domain Names page at http://www.focusdesigns.co.uk/domain_name.htm is a
replication of a page from our own website -
see http://www.ggs.co.uk/frames/websites/domain_names/framer.htm.

The Hosting page at http://www.focusdesigns.co.uk/hosting.htm is a
replication of a page from our own website - 
see http://www.ggs.co.uk/frames/websites/hosting/framer.htm.

You will note that the content material on each page has been taken from our
own site and that our logo has been reproduced without prior permission.

We are aware that you have also been notified by another company, namely FX
Digital PTy Ltd of a similar copyright infringement issue relating to this
website and we hope that action is taken as soon as possible to have
http://www.focusdesigns.co.uk removed.

Please feel free to contact me should you have any questions or queries
regarding this matter.

Kind regards,
Keith Halliday - Web Designer

GGS Creative Graphics
1 White Lodge Business Park,
Hall Road,
Norwich
Norfolk
NR4 6DG
UK.

Tel: +44 (0) 1603 622500
Fax: +44 (0) 1603 633876
Web: www.ggs.co.uk
Email: keith@ggs.co.uk
